name: Rampid Run
description:
I Am An 12 Year Old Indie Game Dev So Please Do Not Make Fun Of My Game. I Also Started 4 Days Late So There Are Probably Ton Of Bugs. Thank You!

You wake up to find yourself in an abandoned facility. The red lights burn your eyes as the toxic air fills your lungs. You only have about one minute to get to the end... You sprint, jump, and wall run above pits of lava and deadly heights to reach end of each level where you are greeted with a Bright white door. these doors bring you to the next level and Heal you fully so you are prepared for the next level... Good Luck.
